message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $115. I think you'll find it's a great deal for a product of this quality.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Can you consider meeting me halfway?
I understand you're looking for a good price, Bob. How about we settle on $110? That's a fair compromise.
I'm still a bit above my budget, so I'm willing to go as low as $108. Can you meet me there?
